item.title: Zorritos Travel Guide (Northern Coast/Peru/South America)
item.description: Discover the best things to do, places to visit, where to stay, eat, and buy souvenirs in Zorritos, Peru. Learn about the local culture, customs, and safety tips.

item.title: Sejong City Travel Guide (South Chungcheong/South Korea/East Asia/Asia)
item.description: Sejong City is a hidden gem in South Korea, offering a blend of history, culture, nature and adventure. This guide covers everything you need to know about visiting Sejong City, including its top attractions, best things to do, where to stay, what to eat, local customs and safety tips.

item.description: This guide provides a detailed itinerary for visiting Saxon Ore Mountains, Germany, including must-see cultural and natural attractions, hiking routes, food and drink scene, where to stay, and more.
